alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:54AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN HUBBARD...SOUTHEASTERN BELTRAMI AND EASTERN CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 1054 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Upper Red Lake to near Debs to near Lake Itasca, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public report of one inch hail south of Red Lake. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Island Lake in Beltrami County, Puposky, Becida, Ponemah, Nebish, Turtle River and Tenstrike. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
